coreAttributes.authorTag: A note at the bottom of the label informs you that this product was imported by 'Phlarx Pharmaceuticals'.
coreAttributes.name: sybaritic potion
coreAttributes.description: A tiny geometric glass bottle bearing a black label embossed with gold foil that reads 'Sybaritic Energizing Philter.' The fine print below issues a warning that it may cause imbibers to become distressed if not provided with prompt sexual relief. You notice an odd sensation when holding the bottle in your hand; as if it's encouraging you to remove the cap when the time is right.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
#IF(game.isInSex())

As the contents of the small bottle disappear between [npc.herPos] [npc.lips+], [npc.namePos] [npc.eyes] flash soft pink for an instant, before returning to [npc.irisColour]. With a sudden [npc.moan+] and an excited shiver, [npc.herPos] movements intensify as if [npc.sheHasFull] been pent up for far too long.

[## var boost = 3 + RND.nextInt(3); /* randomly select 3, 4, or 5 */ sex.incrementNumberOfAdditionalOrgasms(npc, boost); ]

[style.italicsExcellent([npc.NamePos] desired number of orgasms has been increased by [#~~boost]!)]

#ELSE

As the contents of the small bottle disappear between [npc.herPos] [npc.lips+], [npc.namePos] [npc.verb(feel)] a sensation similar to static electricity, followed by a strange emptiness. However, you do notice a subtle change in [npc.herPos] aura. Perhaps if [npc2.name] had waited until [npc.she] [npc.was] feeling orgasmic bliss, something different would have happened?

[#npc.incrementEssenceCount(RND.nextInt(4)+1,true)] #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the cap and [npc.verb(glance)] down at the refractory philter in [npc.herPos] palm. Before [npc.she] [npc.verb(realize)] what [npc.sheIsFull] doing, the bottle is inverted above [npc.herPos] mouth.
